title: Video: Tubelord – My First Castle
content:
In following up last year’s Tezcatlipoca EP, Kingstonian quartet Tubelord are slated to release sophomore full length Romance via Pink Mist on 10/10/11, and the Kingstonian quartet have teamed up with one Sean Roy Parker (also instrumental in running the fantastic New Cross-based Clinic collective) to produce a video for the album track My First Castle. The song introduces some surprising influences to the mix (Talking Heads, anyone?) that may leave fans of debut full length Our First American Friends‘ heavily guitar-driven sound scratching their heads, but that’s Tubelord I guess, and frankly, the results speak for themselves. Tubelord‘s website can be found here.

Tubelord ≈ My First Castle from Sean Roy Parker on Vimeo.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d3c
